item.title: Sharing dependencies between Spring Boot Microservices with Maven
item.description: Sharing dependencies between Spring Boot Microservices and projects with Maven for better code-reuse and clean design What’s the problem You’re looking at microservices, but you realise you want to send an object from one service to the other. You write a class, and then you copy and paste it from the code of one service to the other … üí° there must be a better way to do this.
